content.html: I've worked with companies leading excellent async-first teams using simply Slack and Notion. You don't need lots of fancy tools. You do need: • Good meeting habits • Clear comms expectations • Updated tool settings/processes
content.value:
I've worked with companies leading excellent async-first teams using simply Slack and Notion.

You don't need lots of fancy tools.

You do need:
• Good meeting habits
• Clear comms expectations
• Updated tool settings/processes
